All Sharktech virtual private servers come with:
* DDoS protected network - explained below
* Access to our global anycast network capable of more than 1.1Tbps traffic.

* Noction Intelligent Routing Platform enhanced network - See it in action with this Sharktech Case Study
* Sharktech's SECURE management panel
* FREE traffic between Sharktech datacenters
* FREE DNS service
* FREE IPv6
* Your choice of any OS (some OSs, such as Windows, require a license or licensing fee.) Linux & FreeBSD are free.
* Free 24x7x365 support
* <15 minute guaranteed ticket response times
* Out of band (OOB) management interface (IPMI, DRAC, iLO)
* Premium, redundant all-Cisco network (AS46844)
